overview:
Ying’s Dream and Goal belies his power and influences of innovation in Internet, China.

His grassroot experience brings his discernment and deep comprehension about China’s internet, especially its net-users’ preference and behaviors. He once worked for 51.com, a local blog SNS site, which only spent 2 years on increment of members from zero to 100 millions.

Prior to that, He was the Founder of OMS, online marketing seminar, once the most famous sessions in Shanghai. Ying worked at B2C, Web2.0, and Loyalty Program Company with extreme performance before his startup.

Ying also is active and well-recognized in Shanghai Local IT entrepreneurs’ weekly Forum as councilman. WUJU has been attracting more and more entrepreneurs to join in with openness, freedom, special viewpoint.

In 2009, Ying has been starting his new venture, Shiyixia.com.

Specialties: Leadership, Entrepreneur, Social Network, Website project management, Platform Operation, Online Marketing, Mobile Marketing. Graphic Design, Web Product, Branding, SNS, B2C, C2C, and so on.
